list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Add clear wallpaper functionality to example app
- Added the ability to clear the wallpaper using the `clearWallpaper` method. - Updated the example app to include a "Clear Wallpaper" button.

task.summary:
Remove Clear Wallpaper and get dimensions functionalities
Removed the `clearWallpaper`, `getDesiredMinimumHeight`, and `getDesiredMinimumWidth` methods from both the Flutter plugin and the Android implementation. Also, removed the corresponding UI element in the example app.

Refactor: Update wallpaper management and example app
- Updated the example app to use a different wallpaper image URL. - Removed unnecessary bitmap scaling in `setWallpaperFromFile`. - Added `clearWallpaper`, `getDesiredMinimumHeight`, and `getDesiredMinimumWidth` methods to get wallpaper info on android. - Removed unnecessary bitmap scaling.

feat: Add set wallpaper from URL functionality
- Added the ability to set a wallpaper directly from a URL. - Implemented `setWallpaper` method to download and set the wallpaper. - Updated the example app to demonstrate the new `setWallpaper` method. - Updated the README file to describe the new functionality.

feat: Add set wallpaper from URL and update permissions
- Added the ability to set a wallpaper directly from a URL. - Updated Android permissions: removed `READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE` and specified `maxSdkVersion` for `WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE`. - Updated iOS notes to clarify wallpaper setting limitations and confirm gallery download support. - Updated features list: removed set wallpaper from File

feat: Add set wallpaper from URL and update permissions
- Added the ability to set a wallpaper directly from a URL. - Updated Android permissions: removed `READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE` and specified `maxSdkVersion` for `WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE`. - Updated iOS notes to clarify wallpaper setting limitations and confirm gallery download support. - Updated features list: removed set wallpaper from File

feat: Add set wallpaper from URL and update permissions
- Added the ability to set a wallpaper directly from a URL. - Updated Android permissions: removed `READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE` and specified `maxSdkVersion` for `WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE`. - Updated iOS notes to clarify wallpaper setting limitations and confirm gallery download support. - Updated features list: removed set wallpaper from File

feat: Add clear wallpaper functionality to example app
- Added the ability to clear the wallpaper using the `clearWallpaper` method. - Updated the example app to include a "Clear Wallpaper" button.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove Clear Wallpaper and get dimensions functionalities
Removed the `clearWallpaper`, `getDesiredMinimumHeight`, and `getDesiredMinimumWidth` methods from both the Flutter plugin and the Android implementation. Also, removed the corresponding UI element in the example app.

Refactor: Update wallpaper management and example app
- Updated the example app to use a different wallpaper image URL. - Removed unnecessary bitmap scaling in `setWallpaperFromFile`. - Added `clearWallpaper`, `getDesiredMinimumHeight`, and `getDesiredMinimumWidth` methods to get wallpaper info on android. - Removed unnecessary bitmap scaling.

feat: Add set wallpaper from URL functionality
- Added the ability to set a wallpaper directly from a URL. - Implemented `setWallpaper` method to download and set the wallpaper. - Updated the example app to demonstrate the new `setWallpaper` method. - Updated the README file to describe the new functionality.

feat: Add set wallpaper from URL and update permissions
- Added the ability to set a wallpaper directly from a URL. - Updated Android permissions: removed `READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE` and specified `maxSdkVersion` for `WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE`. - Updated iOS notes to clarify wallpaper setting limitations and confirm gallery download support. - Updated features list: removed set wallpaper from File

feat: Add clear wallpaper functionality to example app
- Added the ability to clear the wallpaper using the `clearWallpaper` method. - Updated the example app to include a "Clear Wallpaper" button.
